intro: Now that you're awake, help me restore balance to our world!
Walk, run, jump, anything is possible!
I will stay by your side until the end.
laser_begin: Thanks to this tower you will be able to open the door that leads to the next part of our adventure.
Use 'F' nearby so I can feed a laser beam.
Then you can use 'A' and 'E' to help me turn this beam
You can also use the wheel of your mouse to change its inclination.
We have to feed all the towers! Good luck!
fragment: Now retrieve this energy shard with the 'F' key!
This shard, among others, is the key to our success!
Then run to this portal so that we can discover the rest of the world!

intro: I hope you feel ready because this level will be more complicated!
fragment: Hurray! Only the last one left to pick up!
Let's get the world back in balance!
